title: Stone
desc:
Post 2208
- After every turn, this has two random numbers from 0 to 9
 - If it has 3 and 4, cards ending with the number 3 or 4 can be played on it, but not 8
- Cards can only be placed on this depending on the number
- Players may skip their turn if they have no available cards, else they must draw or play their card
